title: Manjula Diamond Haar with Ruby and Emerald Accents
features: The Manjula Haar features a delicate floral design encrusted with dazzling diamonds. The central pendant showcases a vibrant ruby at the top, transitioning to a larger emerald drop below, creating a stunning contrast. Each diamond is meticulously set to maximize brilliance. Pearl drops add a touch of traditional elegance. The necklace is connected by delicate floral diamond motifs connected with a gold chain.
occasions: and special occasions. A dazzling choice for muhurtham or a grand seemantham ceremony. Its modern design also makes it suitable for contemporary celebrations and black-tie events.
description: A testament to Hyderabad's exquisite craftsmanship, this Haar showcases a harmonious blend of tradition and modern design. The brilliant-cut diamonds, combined with the vibrant ruby and emerald, create a captivating sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. The floral motif with pearl drops adds a touch of feminine grace, embodying the spirit of Indian artistry. A timeless piece that will elevate any ensemble.
